description: Configures information and tasks for a project. Docs: https://moonrepo.dev/docs/config/project

dependsOn.title: dependsOn
dependsOn.description: Other projects that this project depends on.

deps.title: deps
deps.description: Other projects that this project depends on.

docker.title: docker
docker.description: Configures Docker integration for this project. @since 1.27.0

env.title: env
env.description: A map of environment variables that will be inherited by all tasks within the project.

fileGroups.title: fileGroups
fileGroups.description: A map of group identifiers to a list of file paths, globs, and environment variables, that can be referenced from tasks.

id.title: id
id.description: Overrides the identifier within the project graph, as defined in the workspace projects setting. @since 1.18.0
id.markdownDescription: Overrides the identifier within the project graph, as defined in the workspace `projects` setting. @since 1.18.0

language.title: language
language.description: The primary programming language of the project.

layer.title: layer
layer.description: The layer within the technology stack, for categorizing.

owners.title: owners
owners.description: Defines ownership of source code within the current project, by mapping file paths and globs to owners. An owner is either a user, team, or group. @since 1.8.0

stack.title: stack
stack.description: The technology stack of the project, for categorizing. @since 1.22.0

tags.title: tags
tags.description: A list of tags that this project belongs to, for categorizing, boundary enforcement, and task inheritance.

tasks.title: tasks
tasks.description: A map of identifiers to task objects. Tasks represent the work-unit of a project, and can be ran in the action pipeline.
tasks.markdownDescription: A map of identifiers to task objects. Tasks represent the work-unit of a project, and can be ran in the action pipeline.

toolchains.title: toolchains
toolchains.description: Overrides top-level toolchain settings, scoped to this project.
toolchains.markdownDescription: Overrides top-level toolchain settings, scoped to this project.

workspace.title: workspace
workspace.description: Overrides top-level workspace settings, scoped to this project.
workspace.markdownDescription: Overrides top-level workspace settings, scoped to this project.

DependencyScope.description: The relationship scope of a dependency.

DependencySource.description: The source where the dependency comes from. Either explicitly defined in configuration, or implicitly derived from source files.

DockerFileConfig.description: Configures Dockerfile generation. When configured at the workspace-level, applies to all projects, but can be overridden at the project-level.

buildTask.title: buildTask
buildTask.description: A task identifier within the current project for building the project. If not defined, will skip the build step.

image.title: image
image.description: The base Docker image to use. If not defined, will use the provided image from the first matching toolchain, otherwise defaults to "scratch".

runPrune.title: runPrune
runPrune.description: Run the moon docker prune command after building the project, but before starting it. @since 2.0.0
runPrune.markdownDescription: Run the `moon docker prune` command after building the project, but before starting it. @since 2.0.0

runSetup.title: runSetup
runSetup.description: Run the moon docker setup command after scaffolding, but before building the project. @since 2.0.0
runSetup.markdownDescription: Run the `moon docker setup` command after scaffolding, but before building the project. @since 2.0.0

startTask.title: startTask
startTask.description: A task identifier within the current project for starting the project within the CMD instruction. If not defined, will skip the start step and not include the CMD instruction.
startTask.markdownDescription: A task identifier within the current project for starting the project within the `CMD` instruction. If not defined, will skip the start step and not include the `CMD` instruction.

template.title: template
template.description: A custom template file, relative from the workspace root, to use when rendering the Dockerfile. Powered by Tera.
template.markdownDescription: A custom template file, relative from the workspace root, to use when rendering the `Dockerfile`. Powered by Tera.

DockerFileConfig.markdownDescription: Configures `Dockerfile` generation. When configured at the workspace-level, applies to all projects, but can be overridden at the project-level.

DockerScaffoldConfig.description: Configures aspects of the Docker scaffolding process. When configured at the workspace-level, applies to all projects, but can be overridden at the project-level.

configsPhaseGlobs.title: configsPhaseGlobs
configsPhaseGlobs.description: List of glob patterns in which to include/exclude files in the "configs" skeleton. Applies to both project and workspace level scaffolding.

sourcesPhaseGlobs.title: sourcesPhaseGlobs
sourcesPhaseGlobs.description: List of glob patterns in which to include/exclude files in the "sources" skeleton. Applies to both project and workspace level scaffolding.

DockerScaffoldConfig.markdownDescription: Configures aspects of the Docker scaffolding process. When configured at the workspace-level, applies to all projects, but can be overridden at the project-level.

as.title: as
as.description: Format to resolve the file group into.

format.title: format
format.description: Format to resolve the file group into.

FileGroupInputFormat.description: Available formats to resolve the file group into.

content.title: content
content.description: Regex pattern to match the file's contents against when determining affected status.

optional.title: optional
optional.description: Mark the file as optional instead of logging a warning when hashing a task.

optional.title: optional
optional.description: Mark the file as optional instead of failing with an error after running a task and the output doesn't exist.

cache.title: cache
cache.description: Cache the glob walking result for increased performance.

optional.title: optional
optional.description: Mark the file as optional instead of failing with an error after running a task and the output doesn't exist.

LanguageType.description: Supported programming languages that each project can be written in.

LayerType.description: The layer within the technology stack, for categorizing.

OwnersConfig.description: Defines ownership of source code within the current project, by mapping file paths and glob patterns to owners. An owner is either a user, team, or group.

customGroups.title: customGroups
customGroups.description: Bitbucket only. A map of custom groups (prefixed with @@@), to a list of user and normal groups.
customGroups.markdownDescription: Bitbucket only. A map of custom groups (prefixed with `@@@`), to a list of user and normal groups.

optional.title: optional
optional.description: GitLab only. Marks the code owners section as optional.

paths.title: paths
paths.description: A list or map of file paths and glob patterns to owners. When a list, the defaultOwner is the owner, and each item is a path. When a map, the key is a path, and the value is a list of owners.
paths.markdownDescription: A list or map of file paths and glob patterns to owners. When a list, the `defaultOwner` is the owner, and each item is a path. When a map, the key is a path, and the value is a list of owners.

requiredApprovals.title: requiredApprovals
requiredApprovals.description: Bitbucket and GitLab only. The number of approvals required for the request to be satisfied. For Bitbucket, utilizes the Check() condition. For GitLab, marks the code owners section as required.
requiredApprovals.markdownDescription: Bitbucket and GitLab only. The number of approvals required for the request to be satisfied. For Bitbucket, utilizes the `Check()` condition. For GitLab, marks the code owners section as required.

OwnersPaths.description: A mapping of file paths and file globs to owners.

PluginLocator.description: Strategies and protocols for locating plugins.

ProjectDependencyConfig.description: Expanded information about a project dependency.

id.title: id
id.description: Identifier of the depended on project.

source.title: source
source.description: Source of where the dependency came from.

ProjectDependsOn.description: Expanded information about a project dependency.

file.title: file
file.description: Configures aspects of the Dockerfile generation process. @since 1.27.0
file.markdownDescription: Configures aspects of the `Dockerfile` generation process. @since 1.27.0

scaffold.title: scaffold
scaffold.description: Configures aspects of the Docker scaffolding process. @since 1.27.0

fileGroup.title: fileGroup
fileGroup.description: A file group identifier within the project in which to determine affected status.

filter.title: filter
filter.description: A list of globs, relative from the project's root, in which to determine affected status.

group.title: group
group.description: A file group identifier within the project in which to determine affected status.

channel.title: channel
channel.description: The Slack, Discord, IRC, etc, channel to discuss the project. Must start with a #.
channel.markdownDescription: The Slack, Discord, IRC, etc, channel to discuss the project. Must start with a `#`.

description.title: description
description.description: A description on what the project does and why it exists.

maintainers.title: maintainers
maintainers.description: The individual maintainers of the project. The format is unspecified.

owner.title: owner
owner.description: The owner of the project. Can be an individual, team, or organization. The format is unspecified.

title.title: title
title.description: A human-readable title of the project.
title.markdownDescription: A human-readable title of the project.

ProjectToolchainEntry.description: Variants a project-level toolchain can be configured.
ProjectToolchainEntry.markdownDescription: Variants a project-level toolchain can be configured.

ProjectToolchainsConfig.description: Overrides top-level toolchain settings, scoped to this project.

default.title: default
default.description: A single toolchain, or list of toolchains, to inherit for this project and all of its tasks. @since 1.31.0

defaults.title: defaults
defaults.description: A single toolchain, or list of toolchains, to inherit for this project and all of its tasks. @since 1.31.0

ProjectToolchainsConfig.markdownDescription: Overrides top-level toolchain settings, scoped to this project.

ProjectWorkspaceConfig.description: Overrides workspace settings, scoped to this project.

ProjectWorkspaceInheritedTasksConfig.description: Controls how workspace-level tasks are inherited.

exclude.title: exclude
exclude.description: Excludes inheriting tasks by their identifier.

include.title: include
include.description: Only inherits tasks with the provided identifiers, and ignores the rest. When not defined, inherits all matching tasks. When an empty list, inherits no tasks.

rename.title: rename
rename.description: Renames inherited tasks by mapping their existing identifier to a new identifier, scoped to this project.

ProjectWorkspaceInheritedTasksConfig.markdownDescription: Controls how workspace-level tasks are inherited.

StackType.description: The technology stack of the project, for categorizing.

TaskArgs.description: Configures a command and its arguments to execute.

TaskConfig.description: Configures a task to be ran within the action pipeline.

args.title: args
args.description: Arguments to pass to the command when it's ran. Can be defined as a string, or a list of individual arguments.

command.title: command
command.description: The command line to execute when the task is ran. Supports the command (executable) with or without arguments. Can be defined as a string, or a list of individual arguments.

dependsOn.title: dependsOn
dependsOn.description: Other tasks that this task depends on, and must run to completion before this task is ran. Can depend on sibling tasks, or tasks in other projects, using targets.

deps.title: deps
deps.description: Other tasks that this task depends on, and must run to completion before this task is ran. Can depend on sibling tasks, or tasks in other projects, using targets.

description.title: description
description.description: A human-readable description about the task. @since 1.22.0

env.title: env
env.description: A map of environment variables that will be set in the child process when the task is ran.

extends.title: extends
extends.description: Extends settings from a sibling task by identifier.

inputs.title: inputs
inputs.description: A list of inputs that will be hashing and compared against changed files to determine affected status. If affected, the task will run, otherwise it will exit early. An input can be a literal file path, a glob pattern, environment variable, and more.  When not provided, all files within the project are considered inputs. When an empty list, no files are considered. Otherwise, an explicit list of inputs are considered.

options.title: options
options.description: Options to control task inheritance, execution, and more.

outputs.title: outputs
outputs.description: A list of outputs that will be created when the task has successfully ran. An output can be a literal file path, or a glob pattern.

preset.title: preset
preset.description: The preset to apply for the task. Will inherit default options.

script.title: script
script.description: A script to run within a shell. A script is anything from a single command, to multiple commands, or shell specific syntax. Does not support arguments, merging, or inheritance. This overrides command and args. @since 1.27.0
script.markdownDescription: A script to run within a shell. A script is anything from a single command, to multiple commands, or shell specific syntax. Does not support arguments, merging, or inheritance. This overrides `command` and `args`. @since 1.27.0

toolchain.title: toolchain
toolchain.description: A toolchain, or list of toolchains, in which the task will inherit functionality from.

toolchains.title: toolchains
toolchains.description: A toolchain, or list of toolchains, in which the task will inherit functionality from.

type.title: type
type.description: The type of task, primarily used for categorical reasons. When not provided, will be automatically determined based on configured outputs.

TaskDependency.description: Configures another task that this task depends on.

TaskDependencyConfig.description: Expanded information about a task dependency.

args.title: args
args.description: Additional arguments to pass to this dependency when it's ran.

env.title: env
env.description: A map of environment variables specific to this dependency.

optional.title: optional
optional.description: Marks the dependency as optional when being inherited from the top-level. @since 1.20.0
optional.markdownDescription: Marks the dependency as optional when being inherited from the top-level. @since 1.20.0

target.title: target
target.description: The target of the depended on task.

TaskMergeStrategy.description: The strategy in which to merge a specific task option.

TaskOperatingSystem.description: The operating system in which to only run this task on.

TaskOptionAffectedFilesConfig.description: Expanded information about affected files handling.

pass.title: pass
pass.description: The pattern in which affected files will be passed to the affected task.

passInputsWhenNoMatch.title: passInputsWhenNoMatch
passInputsWhenNoMatch.description: When no affected files are matching, pass the task's inputs as arguments to the command, instead of ..
passInputsWhenNoMatch.markdownDescription: When no affected files are matching, pass the task's inputs as arguments to the command, instead of `.`.

TaskOptionsConfig.description: Options to control task inheritance, execution, and more.

affectedFiles.title: affectedFiles
affectedFiles.description: The pattern in which affected files will be passed to the task.

allowFailure.title: allowFailure
allowFailure.description: Allow the task to fail without failing the entire action pipeline. @since 1.13.0

cache.title: cache
cache.description: Cache the outputs of the task for incremental builds. Defaults to true if outputs are configured for the task.
cache.markdownDescription: Cache the `outputs` of the task for incremental builds. Defaults to `true` if outputs are configured for the task.

cacheKey.title: cacheKey
cacheKey.description: A custom key to include in the cache hashing process. Can be used to invalidate local and remote caches.

cacheLifetime.title: cacheLifetime
cacheLifetime.description: Lifetime to cache the task itself, in the format of "1h", "30m", etc. If not defined, caches live forever, or until inputs change. @since 1.29.0

envFile.title: envFile
envFile.description: Loads and sets environment variables from the .env file(s) when running the task.
envFile.markdownDescription: Loads and sets environment variables from the `.env` file(s) when running the task.

inferInputs.title: inferInputs
inferInputs.description: Automatically infer inputs from file groups or environment variables that were utilized within command, script, args, and env. @since 1.31.0
inferInputs.markdownDescription: Automatically infer inputs from file groups or environment variables that were utilized within `command`, `script`, `args`, and `env`. @since 1.31.0

interactive.title: interactive
interactive.description: Marks the task as interactive, so that it will run in isolation, and have direct access to stdin. @since 1.12.0

internal.title: internal
internal.description: Marks the task as internal, which disables it from being ran from the command line, but can still be depended on by other tasks. @since 1.23.0

merge.title: merge
merge.description: The default strategy to use when merging args, deps, env, inputs, or outputs with an inherited task. Can be overridden with the other field-specific merge options.
merge.markdownDescription: The default strategy to use when merging `args`, `deps`, `env`, `inputs`, or `outputs` with an inherited task. Can be overridden with the other field-specific merge options.

mergeArgs.title: mergeArgs
mergeArgs.description: The strategy to use when merging args with an inherited task.
mergeArgs.markdownDescription: The strategy to use when merging `args` with an inherited task.

mergeDeps.title: mergeDeps
mergeDeps.description: The strategy to use when merging deps with an inherited task.
mergeDeps.markdownDescription: The strategy to use when merging `deps` with an inherited task.

mergeEnv.title: mergeEnv
mergeEnv.description: The strategy to use when merging env with an inherited task.
mergeEnv.markdownDescription: The strategy to use when merging `env` with an inherited task.

mergeInputs.title: mergeInputs
mergeInputs.description: The strategy to use when merging inputs with an inherited task.
mergeInputs.markdownDescription: The strategy to use when merging `inputs` with an inherited task.

mergeOutputs.title: mergeOutputs
mergeOutputs.description: The strategy to use when merging outputs with an inherited task.
mergeOutputs.markdownDescription: The strategy to use when merging `outputs` with an inherited task.

mergeToolchains.title: mergeToolchains
mergeToolchains.description: The strategy to use when merging toolchains with an inherited task. @since 2.0.0
mergeToolchains.markdownDescription: The strategy to use when merging `toolchains` with an inherited task. @since 2.0.0

mutex.title: mutex
mutex.description: Creates an exclusive lock on a virtual resource, preventing other tasks using the same resource from running concurrently. @since 1.24.0

os.title: os
os.description: The operating system in which to only run this task on.

outputStyle.title: outputStyle
outputStyle.description: The style in which task output will be printed to the console.

persistent.title: persistent
persistent.description: Marks the task as persistent (continuously running). This is ideal for watchers, servers, or never-ending processes. @since 1.6.0
persistent.markdownDescription: Marks the task as persistent (continuously running). This is ideal for watchers, servers, or never-ending processes. @since 1.6.0

priority.title: priority
priority.description: Marks the task with a certain priority, which determines the order in which it is ran within the action pipeline.

retryCount.title: retryCount
retryCount.description: The number of times a failing task will be retried to succeed.

runDepsInParallel.title: runDepsInParallel
runDepsInParallel.description: Runs direct task dependencies (via deps) in sequential order. This does not apply to indirect or transient dependencies.
runDepsInParallel.markdownDescription: Runs direct task dependencies (via `deps`) in sequential order. This _does not_ apply to indirect or transient dependencies.

runFromWorkspaceRoot.title: runFromWorkspaceRoot
runFromWorkspaceRoot.description: Runs the task from the workspace root, instead of the project root.

runInCI.title: runInCI
runInCI.description: Whether to run the task in CI or not, when executing moon ci, moon check, or moon run.
runInCI.markdownDescription: Whether to run the task in CI or not, when executing `moon ci`, `moon check`, or `moon run`.

shell.title: shell
shell.description: Runs the task within a shell. When not defined, runs the task directly while relying on native PATH resolution.
shell.markdownDescription: Runs the task within a shell. When not defined, runs the task directly while relying on native `PATH` resolution.

timeout.title: timeout
timeout.description: The maximum time in seconds that a task can run before being cancelled.

unixShell.title: unixShell
unixShell.description: The shell to run the task in when on a Unix-based machine. @since 1.21.0
unixShell.markdownDescription: The shell to run the task in when on a Unix-based machine. @since 1.21.0

windowsShell.title: windowsShell
windowsShell.description: The shell to run the task in when on a Windows machine. @since 1.21.0

TaskOutputStyle.description: The style in which task output will be printed to the console.

TaskPriority.description: The priority levels a task can be bucketed into when running in the action pipeline.

TaskUnixShell.description: A list of available shells on Unix.

TaskWindowsShell.description: A list of available shells on Windows.

plugin.title: plugin
plugin.description: Location of the WASM plugin to use.

version.title: version
version.description: The version of the toolchain to download and install.

versionFromPrototools.title: versionFromPrototools
versionFromPrototools.description: Inherit the version from the root .prototools. When true, matches using the same identifier, otherwise a string can be provided for a custom identifier.
versionFromPrototools.markdownDescription: Inherit the version from the root `.prototools`. When true, matches using the same identifier, otherwise a string can be provided for a custom identifier.

ToolchainPluginVersionFrom.description: The strategy in which to inherit a version from .prototools.
ToolchainPluginVersionFrom.markdownDescription: The strategy in which to inherit a version from `.prototools`.

UnresolvedVersionSpec.description: Represents an unresolved version or alias that must be resolved to a fully-qualified version.
UnresolvedVersionSpec.markdownDescription: Represents an unresolved version or alias that must be resolved to a fully-qualified version.
